official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of the phrase, "Under God", in the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag of the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the phrase, "Under God," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be part of the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag of the United States of America.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of the phrase, "Under God", in the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag of the United States.
